person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bill Jordan , general secretary of the International Confederation of Free Trade Unions ( ICFTU ) , told a news conference the withdrawal of a WTO invitation to ILO director general Michel Hansenne was " outrageous behaviour on the part of an organisation that wants to command respect in the world " .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Bill Jordan |
| Michel Hansenne |

The other entities in the paragraph, "general secretary", "International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU)", "news conference", "WTO", and "ILO" do not refer to people, so they are not included in the table.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bill Jordan , general secretary of the International Confederation of Free Trade Unions ( ICFTU ) , told a news conference the withdrawal of a WTO invitation to ILO director general Michel Hansenne was " outrageous behaviour on the part of an organisation that wants to command respect in the world " .

Let's think step by step.

| Location     |
|--------------|
| WTO          |
| ILO          |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions two organizations, the World Trade Organization (WTO) and the International Labour Organization (ILO). These are the only location-based entities in the text.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location     |
|--------------|
| WTO          |
| ILO          |

Explanation:

The only clear location-based entities in the text are the World Trade Organization (WTO) and the International Labour Organization (ILO). The other entities mentioned, such as "Bill Jordan," "general secretary of the International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU)," and "a news conference" do not refer to physical locations.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bill Jordan , general secretary of the International Confederation of Free Trade Unions ( ICFTU ) , told a news conference the withdrawal of a WTO invitation to ILO director general Michel Hansenne was " outrageous behaviour on the part of an organisation that wants to command respect in the world " .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU) |
| WTO |
| ILO |

Explanation:

The "Organization" entities in the paragraph are:

1. International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU) - mentioned as the organization that Bill Jordan is the general secretary of.
2. WTO - mentioned as the organization that withdrew an invitation to ILO director general Michel Hansenne.
3. ILO - mentioned as the organization to which an invitation was extended by WTO and then withdrawn.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU) |
| WTO |
| ILO |

Explanation:

All the entities in the previous answer are clear references to organizations, so no changes are needed. The International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU) is an international organization, WTO is the World Trade Organization, and ILO is the International Labour Organization.
